summary: Website for “वैष्णवी ई-मित्र & CSC केन्द्र” (E-Mitra & CSC centre) in कोटा (माम), करौली, showcasing services, address, and contact details (Operator: Rahul Chavariya).
architectural_notes: Site content/language: Hindi promotional content for Vaishnavi E-Mitra & CSC centre.
Key business details to display: Operator Rahul Chavariya; phone/WhatsApp +91-7426049215; location/address in Kota (Mam), Karauli.
known_issues: Form requirement is not fully specified (contact form vs service-request form vs both).
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Minimal vector-style logo/mark featuring a small storefront + document motif, warm neutral palette with saffron/green accents (vaishnavi-logo.dim_512x512.png)
- Wide hero banner illustration of a local digital services counter with subtle government-document icons, clean modern flat style (vaishnavi-hero.dim_1600x900.png)

existing_features.title: Create a responsive informational website for “वैष्णवी ई-मित्र & CSC केन्द्र” that presents the business name, tagline, location (कोटा (माम), करौली), operator name (Rahul Chavariya), and contact/WhatsApp number (+91-7426049215), using the user-provided Hindi content as the primary copy.
Add a clear navigation structure (single-page sections or multi-page, developer choice) that at minimum includes: Home/Intro, Services, Why Choose Us, Contact/Address, and a Form section.

Implement a website form for customer inquiries that supports both “Contact” and “Service request” use cases by including an Inquiry Type field (e.g., dropdown) along with name, phone number, optional email, message/details, and optional service/category selection.

Apply a cohesive visual theme (colors, typography, spacing, components) suitable for a local digital services center. Avoid blue/purple as primary brand colors. Use Tailwind + existing UI components without editing any immutable component source files.
Add a simple footer with business name, location, operator name, and contact number, plus a brief disclaimer line (e.g., ‘Service availability may vary by government portal status.’).
Render newly generated static images (from frontend/public/assets/generated) in the site layout (hero and logo/mark) without routing images through the backend.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an informational business website for “वैष्णवी ई-मित्र & CSC केन्द्र” including services list, address (कोटा (माम), करौली), and operator/contact details (Rahul Chavariya, +91-7426049215).
Add a website form (e.g., contact form and/or service request form).

Create backend endpoints in the single Motoko main actor to accept and store form submissions (timestamped) and to retrieve submissions for basic internal review (no public display unless explicitly enabled).
